text: Revolutionary Socialist Labor Party, a radical split from the Socialist Labor Party in the United States. RSLP was formed in 1881 by anarchist-oriented elements of the SLP that had rallied around 'Revolutionary Clubs'. In 1883 it merged with other anarchist groups to form the International Working People's Association. title: Revolutionary Socialist Labor Party
